words.source: Noun feminine singular construct; all major translations (KJV, ESV, NASB)
Proper noun; all translations
Preposition לְ + noun פָנִים (face) construct + 2ms possessive suffix; KJV 'before thee', ESV 'before you'
Pronoun 3fs with copula; some translations omit or restructure
Preposition בְּ + noun מֵיטַב (best part); KJV 'in the best', NASB 'in the best'
Definite article + noun feminine singular; construct relationship with preceding מֵיטַב
Hiphil imperative 2ms from יָשַׁב; KJV 'make...dwell', ESV 'Settle'
Accusative particle; marks direct object
Noun masculine singular construct + 2ms possessive suffix; all translations
Conjunction וְ + accusative particle; coordinates with preceding אֶת
Noun masculine plural construct + 2ms possessive suffix; all translations
Qal imperfect 3mp from יָשַׁב; jussive sense; KJV 'let them dwell', ESV 'Let them settle'
Preposition בְּ + noun feminine singular construct; all translations
Proper noun; all translations
Conjunction וְ + conditional particle אִם; all translations
Qal perfect 2ms from יָדַע; KJV 'thou knowest', ESV 'you know'
Conjunction וְ + existential particle יֶשׁ; all translations
Preposition בְּ + 3mp pronoun suffix; all translations
Noun masculine plural construct; construct relationship with following חַיִל
Noun masculine singular; means strength, prowess, ability; KJV 'able men', NASB 'capable men'
Conjunction וְ + Qal perfect 2ms from שׂוּם + 3mp object suffix; KJV 'put them', ESV 'put them'
Noun masculine plural construct; construct relationship with following מִקְנֶה
Noun masculine singular; from קָנָה (to possess); refers to cattle/property; KJV 'cattle', NASB 'livestock'
Preposition; indicates authority/oversight; all translations
Relative pronoun; introduces relative clause; all translations
Preposition לְ + 1s pronoun suffix; KJV 'mine', ESV 'my'
